A community initiative to help parents in these challenging times.

We know how difficult it is to juggle meetings, reports and children.

That's why we created VirtualSitter.SG, a free service (as in we do not collect any fees) that allows busy parents to quickly find virtual babysitters to remotely babysit their children for an hour or two.

How it works

If you're a parent looking for a virtual sitter, just click here, select your filters and click Update View to find the most suitable virtual babysitter for your child.

Once you've decided on your virtual sitter, just select the number of hours and click on Request for virtual sitting service to confirm the arrangements with your sitter. It's that easy!

Some tips and advice for the best virtual sitting experience

  • Never leave your child unattended, the sitter is not able to physically supervise or control your child via video

  • Do review with the sitter beforehand on any planned activities to determine whatâ€™s appropriate for your child.

  • This service is best suited for children aged 2 years old and above.
